DOCNAME: JEDNOTA KATOLICKÝCH TOVARYŠŮ  v. THE CZECH REPUBLIC
TEXT: The applicant , Jednota Katolických ORG , is a NORP non - profit religious organisation with its head office in GPE . It was represented before the ORG by Mr O. Choděra , a lawyer practising in GPE . The respondent Government were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE the applicant lodged an action against GPE ( GPE město GPE ) with the GPE CARDINAL ORG ( obvodní soud ) , seeking to establish its ownership of property which had been bought by the purported legal predecessor of the applicant in DATE .
On DATE the court received the applicant 's power of attorney for its lawyer .

After adjourning hearings on DATE and DATE upon the applicant 's request , on DATE for a lack of evidence and on DATE and DATE because of the absence of CARDINAL of the parties to the proceedings , ORG dismissed the applicant 's action on DATE .
On DATE ORG ( městský soud ) , upon the applicant 's appeal of DATE , quashed ORG judgment and remitted the case .
After the adjournment of a hearing on DATE because of the applicant 's failure to submit certain documents , on DATE ORG granted the applicant 's action .
Upon the defendant 's appeal and after receiving the applicant 's observations on DATE , ORG upheld ORG judgment on DATE .
On DATE the defendant lodged an appeal on points of law ( dovolání ) with ORG ( PERSON ) .
On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the applicant submitted its observations .
In the meantime , on DATE and CARDINAL DATE the defendant , and on DATE and DATE the applicant , replaced their lawyers .
On DATE ORG quashed the lower courts judgments of DATE and CARDINAL DATE and remitted the case to ORG for further proceedings .
On DATE and CARDINAL DATE respectively , ORG judgment was notified to ORG and the applicant 's lawyer .
On DATE the case was assigned to another judge .
On DATE and DATE respectively , ORG requested the applicant to present additional evidence and the applicant requested the court to hear additional witnesses .
On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's action .
On DATE ORG , upon the applicant 's appeal , upheld this judgment .
On unspecified dates , the applicant lodged an appeal on points of law with ORG and a constitutional appeal ( ústavní stížnost ) with ORG ( GPE soud ) .
On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's appeal as manifestly ill - founded .
